page.title: 12The Leisure Centre.
page.content:
The Leisure Centre in Kidderminster was started in 1983 and is due to be finished at the end of 1985. It has a huge swimming pool with a wave machine and a large slide. It has five squash courts, a small gymnasium and a creche. There are plans for phase II to be built in the future - facilities for badminton, table-tennis, training, five-a-side football etc.
It is hoped that this Leisure Centre will attract people from far afield. It is an ambitious and imaginative scheme providing facilities for Kidderminster which will be unique in the Midlands.
